item.title: Heating automation - setup hardware and ebus

item.title: Setup debian system
item.description: Intro This page is mainly to document the steps starting from a fresh linux install and setting up homeassistant and ebusd. It starts with a fresh install of the debian based crunchbangplusplus, here installed on an (old) laptop with i386 processor. The same method has worked on other debian based systems (tested on armbian running on a singleboard computer). It is assumed the debian based distro is based on debian Buster.
